column1: Little Goat Diner////If you eat breakfast here in the morning
column2: you may not eat the rest of the day.  Portions are very large.  I had the sourdough pancakes
column3: after being assured that they were not on the menu just to have a pancake on the menu.  Excellent.  Outstanding.  Also
column4: the housemade sausages were great.  The cinnamon roll was shared and really good.  One thing to remember
column6: this place fills up fast.  Get there early or bring a paper or two or a e-reader
column7: grab a cup of coffee at the adjacent bar/bakery and sit in for a wait.
